overworldAction.actionDescription: Press X on the overworld to get information about the board you're located on. If you walk up to a character you can speak to, you'll get information on them as well!

moves.moveDesc: Make an attack on one enemy very similar to Mario's jump. If the enemy has spikes, goombella will take damage.
moves.actionCommand: Press A when goombella makes contact with the enemy to land an additional hit.

moves.moveDesc: Look up an enemy in the tattle log to reveal their HP bar and information in the journal
moves.actionCommand: Press A when the moving cursor is over the enemy.
moves.stylishTiming: Right after hitting the action command.

moves.moveDesc: Make an attack on one enemy similar to Mario's Power Jump badge move.
moves.actionCommand: Press A when goombella makes contact with the enemy to land an additional hit.

moves.moveDesc: Complete the action command to tranfer Goombella's move slot to Mario for an additional move.
moves.actionCommand: Mash A or B depending on which icon is larger on-screen.
